books.description: The inequality of female desire is explored through the sex lives of a homemaker, a high school student and a restauranteur. Read by Tara Lynne Barr, Marin Ireland, Mena Suvari and the author. 11 hours, 24 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THREE WOMEN

books.author: Tim Alberta
books.description: Politico Magazine’s chief political correspondent describes a decade-long civil war inside the G.O.P. and Donald Trump’s concurrent ascension. Read by Jason Culp. 26 hours, 23 minutes unabridged.
books.title: AMERICAN CARNAGE

books.author: Paul Holes, Jim Clemente and Peter McDonnell
books.contributor: by Paul Holes, Jim Clemente and Peter McDonnell
books.description: A conversation about the story behind the investigation of the Golden State Killer. Read by Paul Holes and Jim Clemente. 6 hours, 13 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EVIL HAS A NAME

books.author: Kevin Hart with Neil Strauss
books.contributor: by Kevin Hart with Neil Strauss
books.description: The comedian’s personal and professional life. Read by Kevin Hart. 11 hours, 14 minutes unabridged.
books.title: I CAN'T MAKE THIS UP

books.author: Mollie Hemingway and Carrie Severino
books.contributor: by Mollie Hemingway and Carrie Severino
books.description: The conservative authors give their take on the confirmation of Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh. Read by the authors. 11 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: JUSTICE ON TRIAL

books.author: David McCullough
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning historian tells the story of the settling of the Northwest Territory. Read by John Bedford Lloyd. 10 hours, 23 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE PIONEERS

books.author: David Epstein
books.description: An argument for how generalists excel more than specialists. Read by Will Damron. 10 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: RANGE

books.author: Adam Higginbotham
books.description: An account of the 1986 disaster at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, based on hundreds of hours of interviews. Read by Jacques Roy. 13 hours, 55 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MIDNIGHT IN CHERNOBYL

books.author: John Carreyrou
books.description: The rise and fall of the biotech startup Theranos. Read by Will Damron. 11 hours, 36 minutes unabridged.
